description:
Upon visiting Uryu in the hospital, Ichigo and Rukia must fight off a wave of rushing water that turns into a water doll belonging to two malevolent Bounts.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Assaut de l`eau ! Évasion de l`hôpital fermé !
Mizu no Kougeki! Tozasareta Byouin kara no Dasshutsu
Water assault! Escape from the closed hospital
水の攻撃! 閉ざされた病院からの脱出
